body_html: This is possible in the raw tf.data API, but the session management in estimators makes it tricky. I believe the recommended API to avoid restarting the session at evaluation time is tf.contrib.estimator.InMemoryEvaluatorHook. Assigning to @ispirmustafa for confirmation.
body_text: This is possible in the raw tf.data API, but the session management in estimators makes it tricky. I believe the recommended API to avoid restarting the session at evaluation time is tf.contrib.estimator.InMemoryEvaluatorHook. Assigning to @ispirmustafa for confirmation.
body: This is possible in the raw `tf.data` API, but the session management in estimators makes it tricky. I believe the recommended API to avoid restarting the session at evaluation time is [`tf.contrib.estimator.InMemoryEvaluatorHook`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/estimator/InMemoryEvaluatorHook). Assigning to @ispirmustafa for confirmation.
